name: Cura Pecuniam
description:
Hello everybody!

Here is a brief guide on how to play our game. Your aim is to save energy! How? Quite simply: the goal of this game is to prevent the residents of the house from wasting electricity :) As soon as you see the light in the window, click the LMB on the window. But be careful - if you don't do this or miss the light in the window - your total energy reserve will decrease and you will lose! 

Good luck!
